17 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save 19American62Woman 25 points 6 hours ago My small Texas town was 99% white. It changed literally overnight. Now our stores all look ransacked, things under lock and key. Candy? Yep. permalink parent award report block reply iamherefortheluls 2 points 2 hours ago and can’t get a job unless you are dark white libs refuse to get this. Literally no one else, anywhere in the world, thinks racial discrimination is bad when its done for their in-group's preference. Everyone except 'white' people wants to hire only 'their own kind' permalink parent award report block reply BenDoverAssho 16 points 6 hours ago The Kalergi Plan is working. White replacement is a real phenomenon. The solution: 1- Our borders need to be shut, 2- legal immigration needs to be greatly reduced and limited to White Western people only, and 3- mass deportations of illegal foreigners need to be ramped up a hundred fold. Currently, I'm not sure that any of this is happening. permalink award report block reply someguy7738 12 points 6 hours ago And White people need to entirely eschew birth control and have as many children as possible. permalink parent award report block reply greatpumpkin 5 points 1 hour ago That'll never happen unless all divorce laws (& associated drek) going back 106 years are voided. permalink parent award report block reply PatriotSkorzeny 5 points 6 hours ago NC is Yemen and Mexico. Just do a little research to make the case. The ICE online tip line is for ANY SUSPICIOUS ACTIVITY, per their own website: https://www.ice.gov/webform/ice-tip-form Don't be shy. Don't be lazy.
